summary.title: Secure E-commerce Web Application
summary.description: A secure online shopping platform that allows customers to register, browse products, place orders, and make payments. The system also supports admin management of inventory, secure authentication, audit logging, and PayPal payment gateway integration.

diagrams.title: Secure E-commerce DFD

data.name: Customer
data.description: External user who browses, registers, and purchases items from the platform.

data.name: Admin
data.description: Internal user who manages product listings and monitors activity logs.

data.name: Payment Gateway
data.description: Third-party service  that handles secure transaction processing.

data.name:
P1: 
User Authentication
data.description: Handles user login, registration, and session control.

data.name:
P2:
 Browse & 
Search
 Products
data.description: Allows customers to view and search through available products.

data.name:
P3: 
Checkout
data.description: Reviews cart items and prepares order for payment.

data.name:
P4: 
Payment
 Processing
data.description: Handles payment info and sends it to the payment gateway.

data.name:
P5: 
Order
 Management
data.description: Records order details and updates inventory.

data.name:
P6: 
Admin 
Management
data.description: Allows admins to manage product listings and user activity.

data.name:
P7: 
Audit 
Logging
data.description: Captures login, transaction, and admin actions for security logs.

data.name: User DB
data.description: Stores user accounts, passwords, contact and login data.

data.name: Product DB
data.description: Contains product names, prices, categories, and stock count.

data.name: Order DB
data.description: Holds order history, transaction info, and status logs.

data.name: Audit Logs
data.description: Logs of user and admin activity for monitoring and security audit.

diagrams.description: Level 1 Data Flow Diagram for a secure online shopping system. Includes login, checkout, payment gateway integration, and admin features.
